content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine(position (0, 1)), boiler(position (0, 2)) and offshore pump (position (0, 3))

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 4)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position (0, 5)) and a furnace at position (0, 6)
- Burner mining drill (position (0, 7)) and a furnace at position (0, 8)
- Burner mining drill (position (0, 9)) and a furnace at position (0, 10)

### Copper cable factory at position(0, 11)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position (0, 12)) and a furnace at position (0, 13)
- Assembling machine at position (0, 14) and inserter at position (0, 15) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position (0, 16)) that connects the furnace at position (0, 13) to assembling machine at position (0, 14)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in invalid locations
- Ensure you are not attempting to place entities in locations where their footprint overlaps with other entities or water. Check the surrounding area before placing.

### Errors when attempting to place pipes
- Verify the position before placing pipes to ensure they are not overlapping with existing entities or invalid terrain. Use positions that are confirmed to be empty.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target location.
